title: S3 Ep19: Haunted Baseball w/ Dan Gordon - Hr.1
itunes:title: Haunted Baseball w/ Dan Gordon - Hr.1
description:
Author Dan Gordon sits in with Darkness Radio to dish about his new Book, "Haunted Baseball: Ghosts, Curses, Legends, And Eerie Events". 

Dan's Book - https://www.amazon.com/Haunted-Baseball-Ghosts-Curses-Legends/dp/1599210223/ref=pd_bxgy_img_2/146-2561837-4676314?_encoding=UTF8&pd_rd_i=1599210223&pd_rd_r=7318933c-40da-4774-8855-8fc22dbf3def&pd_rd_w=ogL4o&pd_rd_wg=nmtca&pf_rd_p=f325d01c-4658-4593-be83-3e12ca663f0e&pf_rd_r=GSWD9EK3GPECR580ZFR1&psc=1&refRID=GSWD9EK3GPECR580ZFR1
